description:
Uses _check_version(HAVANA, version) which is wrong, should use _check_os_version(HAVANA, version).


Causes traceback:


http://paste.openstack.org/show/44240/
title: Version check for instance metadata broken

comments.content:
Uses _check_version(HAVANA, version) which is wrong, should use _check_os_version(HAVANA, version).


Causes traceback:


http://paste.openstack.org/show/44240/
